title: Team CTD looking for Mid and JG subs.
body:
Team CTD is looking for two subs pref Mid and JG. 
We play in Sumsoc Monday nights and Summoners society ladder matches and scrim regularly so you will get plenty of game time with us.

Looking for a Plat 3 and above, experience in a team of 5 will be favored.

Hit me up for more info and I'll pass on your details to our Coach/ Manager for a tryout. 

TY fam

replies.body:
I am interested in the JG position. Looking to improve and hopefully gain the knowledge that will help me achieve my goal of diamond before the end of the season.   I have experience playing in 5 mans however these were rarely competitive and usually with lower ranked friends.
 OP.GG: https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=GTCookieMonstar
